DOC.brief_summary: The appearance of aged skin is a common cosmetic complaint of middle aged and older individuals. This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of a new laser with cooling to improve the appearance of aged skin. The laser being used will heat various depths of the skin while protecting the outer layer.
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Safety and Efficacy of a Laser With Cooling for Treatment of Skin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Aged skin, light to medium skin types. Exclusion: Known photosensitivity Any of the following preexisting skin conditions: eczema, psoriasis, allergic dermatitis or other conditions that may affect treatment. Other treatments within the past year for aged facial skin
